translation.en: - (Swat 1) Get down! Get down! - (All yelling)
(Swat 2) Don't move!
FBI! Don't move!
Get down! Get down!
(Swat 3) Where are the hostages? Where are the hostages?
translation.es: ¿Dónde están los rehenes? ¿Dónde están los rehenes?

translation.en: (Swat 4) FBI, Police! Don't move! (Swat 3) Down! Stay down!
(Swat 4) Police! Don't move! Police! Don't move!
Get down! Get down!
- (Kate) Clear! - Police! Search warrant. Don't move!
- Steppin' out! - (Swat 5) Police, don't move!
Police, don't move! Search warrant!
(Kate) FBI!
(Man) Are you hit? I'm good.
Fuck! (Swat 2) Front room, clear!
(Kate) Team leader! Status?
(Swat 6) Front clear! (Leader) We're clear, ma'am! Two suspects in custody!
- (Reggie) You OK, Macer? - Yeah.
Why'd he shoot? There's no one here.
translation.es: ¿Por qué dispararía? No hay nadie aquí.

translation.en: (Reggie) Whoa.
What the fuck?
- (Kate) Jesus! - (Retching)
Those weren't our hostages.
No. That was something else.
- (Leader) Macer? - Yeah?
U.S. Attorney wants a statement. What do you want me to say to her?
translation.es: La fiscal quiere una declaración. ¿Qué le digo?

translation.en: The truth.
Looks like Sonora...
translation.es: Parece obra del Cártel de Sonora.

translation.en: Yeah.
How many total?
We've got 15 in this hall here, about 20 in the back bedroom.
translation.es: Tenemos 15 en este corredor y 20 en el dormitorio de atrás.

translation.en: We haven't even checked the attic or under the crawl space.
translation.es: Aún no revisamos el ático ni el sótano.

translation.en: Call DOJ, let 'em know what we have.
translation.es: Informa al Depto. de Justicia lo que hallamos.

translation.en: This one of the houses owned by Manuel Diaz?
translation.es: ¿Esta es una de las casas de Manuel Díaz?

translation.en: No way to connect him, but he owns it.
translation.es: No hay forma de relacionarlo, pero es su casa.

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
Reg, step out. It's OK.
(Officer) Vickers! I need bolt cutters!
Vickers!
(Jennings) PD found something.
(Male newsreader) Such a heavy body count this close to Phoenix
translation.es: Encontrar tantas víctimas tan cerca de Phoenix...

translation.en: is without a doubt a major escalation for the cartels.
translation.es: ...significa, sin duda, una escalada de violencia de los cárteles.

translation.en: There will be pressure in Washington to explain how such a dramatic outrage
translation.es: Habrá mucha presión en Washington para explicar cómo una atrocidad...

translation.en: could happen so deep inside the American heartland.
translation.es: ...de este nivel pudo ocurrir en el corazón de EE.UU.

translation.en: We may be talking about the victims of a turf war
translation.es: Hablamos de posibles víctimas de una disputa territorial...

translation.en: or maybe some illegal immigrants who are tied to a ransom,
translation.es: ...o quizá de inmigrantes ilegales que fueron secuestrados.

translation.en: but it will be some weeks before we have a clearer picture on who the victims...
translation.es: Tardarán semanas en tener datos de las víctimas...

translation.en: (Reggie) What's goin' on?
I have no idea.
(Jennings) She's been leading our kidnap response team for three years.
translation.es: Ha dirigido al equipo antisecuestro durante tres años.

translation.en: Put her through the grinder since she got here, and she hasn't blinked.
translation.es: Ha pasado por las pruebas más duras sin inmutarse.

translation.en: She's in the front line.
Nobody's gonna be happier than Kate to see these guys go down.
translation.es: Nadie estaría más feliz de atrapar a estos tipos que Kate.

translation.en: So she's a thumper.
Today was her fifth O.I.S.
(Matt) 5- and- 0, not bad for a rookie.
She never worked cases? Been kicking doors since day one.
translation.es: -¿Jamás ha tenido un caso? -Siempre ha estado en acción.

translation.en: I like her already. What about the partner? He seen any action?
translation.es: Ya me simpatiza. ¿Y su compañero? ¿Ha estado en acción?

translation.en: He's only been with us 18 months. What's his background?
He's a sharp kid.
ROTC scholarship to Maryland,
translation.es: Becario de los oficiales de reserva en Maryland.

translation.en: did a tour in Iraq, got his law degree from UNC.
translation.es: Estuvo en Iraq. Se tituló como abogado.

translation.en: - He's green, but he's good. - (Matt sighs)
No lawyers on this train. Just give me the girl.
translation.es: No quiero abogados en esto. Solo dame a la chica.

translation.en: We did this by the book, right? Come on, of course.
- Jesus. - What?
Oh, shit.
Would you step in here, Kate?
Quite a find today, the loss of two officers notwithstanding.
translation.es: Qué hallazgo. A pesar de la pérdida de dos oficiales.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
How familiar are you with Manuel Diaz's operation?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto sabe sobre el grupo de Manuel Díaz?

translation.en: His company, Sun Oasis, has 80 or so foreclosure properties.
translation.es: Su empresa, Sun Oasis, tiene alrededor de 80 propiedades en ejecución.

translation.en: He has other legitimate businesses. Um...
But he's rumoured to be linked with one of the Mexican cartels.
translation.es: Hay rumores que lo relacionan con un cártel en México.

translation.en: (Burnett) Manuel Diaz works for the Sonora Cartel.
translation.es: Manuel Díaz trabaja para el Cártel de Sonora.

translation.en: He's most likely their senior member in the United States.
translation.es: Es uno de los líderes en los Estados Unidos.

translation.en: (Matt) What do you know about his brother?
I wasn't aware he had one.
Guillermo. His brother's name is Guillermo.
translation.es: Guillermo. Su nombre es Guillermo. ¿Sabes algo de su primo?

translation.en: Do you know anything about his cousin?
translation.es: Su nombre es Guillermo. ¿Sabes algo de su primo?

translation.en: I didn't know he had one of those either. None of that is in his file.
translation.es: Tampoco. No están en su expediente.

translation.en: His cousin is Fausto Alarcon.
I don't know who that is. No one does. He's off the grid.
translation.es: -No sé quién es. -Nadie lo sabe. No figura en el mapa.

translation.en: (Burnett) He's number three in the Sonora Cartel.
translation.es: Es el tercero al mando en el Cártel de Sonora.

translation.en: This is not my department, sir.
Like I said, Agent Macer doesn't work narcotics.
translation.es: Como dije, la agente Macer no trabaja en Narcóticos.

translation.en: She runs a kidnap response team.
Are you married?
Am I married?
Do you have a husband?
Divorced.
Kids?
No.
Anything else?
No. Thanks, Kate. If you could wait outside, please.
translation.es: No. Gracias, Kate. Por favor, espera afuera.

translation.en: - Well? - I have no clue.
(Reggie) Who are those people? You know?
(Kate) No idea.
(Burnett) Thanks for coming in, guys.
(Phil clears throat) Will you come back in, Kate?
DOJ wants advisors that focus on cartels involved in pursuing Mr Diaz.
translation.es: El Depto. de Justicia quiere consultores que se concentren... ...en los cárteles que persiguen al Sr. Díaz.

translation.en: This is Matt Graver. He'll be leading the team.
translation.es: Él es Matt Graver. Dirigirá al equipo.

translation.en: (Kate) Isn't this Phoenix homicide now?
translation.es: ¿No le corresponde a la policía de Phoenix?

translation.en: No, we're expanding the scope of the investigation a bit.
translation.es: No, estamos ampliando un poco la investigación.

translation.en: You'll act as a liaison. What does that mean?
They need an agent with tactical experience, like you.
translation.es: Necesitan a un agente en experiencia táctica, como tú.

translation.en: State Department is pulling an agent from the field
translation.es: El Depto. de Estado traerá a un agente especializado...

translation.en: that specialises in responding to escalated cartel activity.
translation.es: ...en responder al incremento de la actividad del cártel.

translation.en: You'll be part of the team.
You'll meet up with them at Luke, uh, tomorrow?
translation.es: Te reunirás con ellos en Luke... ¿mañana?

translation.en: - (Matt) Day after. Early. - Air Force Base?
translation.es: -Pasado mañana. Temprano. -¿La base de la fuerza aérea?

translation.en: Yeah, we're gonna go see Guillermo. Diaz's brother?
translation.es: -Sí, iremos a ver a Guillermo. -¿El hermano de Díaz?

translation.en: That's the one.
Where is he?
Uh, he's in the El Paso area.
translation.es: Está en algún lugar de El Paso.

translation.en: What's our objective?
To dramatically overreact.
Kate, you must volunteer for an inter- agency task force.
translation.es: Kate, debes ofrecerte como voluntaria para unirte... ...a una fuerza de tarea interinstitucional.

translation.en: Think very hard before you respond.
translation.es: Piénsalo muy bien antes de responder.

translation.en: You wanna be a part of this?
Do we get an opportunity at the men responsible for today?
translation.es: ¿Intentaremos atrapar a los responsables de lo ocurrido hoy?

translation.en: The men who were really responsible for today, yeah.
I'll volunteer.
(Reggie) You keep an eye on that doughy prick - with the flip- flops. - (Scoffs) Don't trust him.
translation.es: Vigila al imbécil de las sandalias. No confío en él.

translation.en: How you doin', sir? I.D.'s?
She's on the list, but you're not. Well, what's she supposed to do?
translation.es: -Ella está en la lista, usted no. -¿Y qué se supone que haga?

translation.en: I need you to turn this around for me. It's fine. It's good.
I'll call you when we're headed back. - All right. - (Car door closes)
- Morning. - Morning. Am I late?
No, no, no. We just landed. Come on, this way.
translation.es: No, acabamos de llegar. Por acá.

translation.en: My bird dog over there, Alejandro.
translation.es: Ese es Alejandro, mi perro de caza.

translation.en: Are we taking this?
Yeah. Only the best for you.
translation.es: Sí. Solo lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: DOD flies you around in private jets now?
translation.es: ¿El Depto. de Justicia ya vuela en jets privados?

translation.en: Yeah. You guys don't have one of these? Right.
Is there any food on this flight?
translation.es: ¿Hay algo de comer en el vuelo?

translation.en: Uh, there's some bitchin' peanuts in the back.
But it's kind of a self- serve deal.
translation.es: Pero tienes que ir tú por él.

translation.en: (Kate) Kate Macer.
Have you been to Juárez before?
No, I... We're goin' to El Paso, right?
(Groggily) Yeah, amazing. OK.
Are you OK?
Yeah. I'm fine.
So, um...
So this is your speciality?
The cartels in Mexico are your speciality?
Yeah. Yeah.
Is there anything I should know?
Uh, you're asking me how a watch works.
translation.es: Me preguntas cómo funciona un reloj.

translation.en: For now, let's just keep an eye on the time.
translation.es: Por ahora, concéntrate en ver la hora.

translation.en: OK.
How you doin'?
(Steve) Howdy! How you been?
(Matt) Good, buddy. How you feelin'?
translation.es: -¿Cómo has estado? -Bien, amigo. -¿Cómo te has sentido? -Bueno...

translation.en: Well, when I pee, it burns.
translation.es: -¿Cómo te has sentido? -Bueno... Me arde cuando orino.

translation.en: (Matt) Maybe it's gonorrhoea.
What colour is it?
(Steve) Yellow with red specks.
(Matt) Red specks or blood?
(Matt) I'm tryin' to get DOD to let me look into this conspiracy to sink Fiji.
translation.es: Quiero que me envíen a investigar lo de la conspiración para hundir a Fiji.

translation.en: (Steve) Fiji? (Matt) Yeah.
(Steve) Leave Fiji alone, terrorists!
(Matt) Yeah. Exactly. I figure a month or two over there,
translation.es: -¡No se metan con Fiji, terroristas! -Exacto. Imagino que con un mes o dos allá, todo quedará resuelto.

translation.en: we'll get it all worked out.
translation.es: Imagino que con un mes o dos allá, todo quedará resuelto.

translation.en: So who's goin' over there today?
Marshals, DEA... I pulled a team for you, Matt.
translation.es: -¿Quién estará hoy? -Los Federales, la DEA... Reuní a un equipo para ti.

translation.en: Oh, man, I love it when you say a team. It makes me all warm and fuzzy.
translation.es: Cada vez que dices equipo me siento querido y feliz.

translation.en: (Steve) Oh, they're a crack bunch, too. Just rotated back from Afghanistan.
translation.es: Son muy competentes. Acaban de volver de Afganistán.

translation.en: (Matt) Wow. Where's everybody linking up?
(Steve) A.I.C.
(Matt) Good, good, good.
(Man) Mexican Federal Police will meet you at the border
translation.es: La policía federal de México los verá en la frontera...

translation.en: and proceed with you to the courthouse, located here.
translation.es: ...e irá con ustedes hasta la Corte, que se ubica aquí.

translation.en: This is a high- level target.
translation.es: Es un objetivo de alto nivel.

translation.en: The most likely spots for an attempt will be at the exchange
translation.es: Los puntos más probables para un atentado... ...serán durante el intercambio y de regreso, al cruzar la frontera.

translation.en: and at the border crossing on the return.
translation.es: ...serán durante el intercambio y de regreso, al cruzar la frontera.

translation.en: The Marshals will enter...
Kevin, Keith, you wanna stand up?
Now, the Marshals' response team is in Laredo...
translation.es: El equipo de reacción de los Federales está en Laredo.

translation.en: Love Texans.
So our friends from Delta have volunteered to come along
translation.es: El equipo Delta de élite se ofreció a escoltar...

translation.en: and will escort the Marshals on the exchange.
And here's the man of the hour. You comin' with or waitin' here?
translation.es: Y aquí tenemos al hombre del momento. ¿Nos acompañan o esperarán aquí?

translation.en: We'll take the tour with you. Loan us a couple pop guns.
translation.es: Iremos al paseo. Préstennos sus rifles de aire.

translation.en: All right, this is turning into an all- star affair!
Keith, you want another hand on the exchange? (Keith) You sober?
Will be by the time we get there.
Got a bottle in the truck in case your hands get shaky.
translation.es: Puse una botella en el auto, por si te tiemblan las manos.

translation.en: (Matt) I know I could always count on you, Keith.
(Man) All right, we'll gear you up as soon as we're done here.
translation.es: Nos prepararemos en cuanto termine la reunión.

translation.en: Now, Matt, you can be the tip of the spear, and we don't have to rob a guy from Delta.
translation.es: Matt irá a la cabeza, así no tendremos que pedírselo al equipo Delta.

translation.en: Now, be careful on the turnaround.
If the Federale's a shooter, it's gonna happen on the turnaround.
translation.es: Si los atacan, será durante el regreso.

translation.en: Delta's Team One will be the lead vehicle.
translation.es: Delta Uno irá en el primer vehículo.

translation.en: We can divide Team Two between the carry car and the trail vehicle. That OK?
translation.es: Delta Dos entre el auto con el prisionero y el último auto.

translation.en: Good. Now, Delta, if you can identify yourselves
translation.es: Equipo Delta, identifíquense, para que los demás sepan...

translation.en: so everyone knows who to hide behind if shit hits the fan.
translation.es: Equipo Delta, identifíquense, para que los demás sepan... ...detrás de quién esconderse cuando se ponga feo.

translation.en: (All laughing)
translation.es: ...detrás de quién esconderse cuando se ponga feo.

translation.en: The most likely spot for a hit will be at the border crossing on the return.
translation.es: El lugar más probable para un ataque será en el cruce fronterizo, al volver.

translation.en: Anywhere along the way, anyone not in this room is a potential shooter.
translation.es: En el camino, quienquiera que no esté aquí presente, es un tirador potencial.

translation.en: The op isn't over until we get back here.
translation.es: La operación no acaba hasta que volvamos aquí.

translation.en: OK?
Be alert. Be vigilant. And be aware. Let's go.
translation.es: Manténgase atentos, alertas y vigilantes. Andando.

translation.en: What?
(Keith) Hey! I thought you were in prison.
translation.es: ¡Oye! Pensé que estabas en la cárcel.

translation.en: - (Ranger) They took me out. - (Laughs) (Ranger) They needed somebody for this job.
translation.es: Me sacaron. Necesitaban a alguien para el trabajo.

translation.en: (Keith) For good behaviour or bad behaviour?
Have you ever been over there?
I worked in Juárez.
For the DEA?
No.
For who?
For Mexico.
I was a prosecutor.
- You're not American? - No.
Who do you work for now?
Oh, I go where I'm sent.
Where were you sent from?
Cartagena.
Colombia.
Listen...
Nothing will make sense to your American ears.
translation.es: Ahora nada tiene sentido para ti.

translation.en: And you will doubt everything that we do.
translation.es: Y pondrás en duda todo lo que hacemos.

translation.en: But in the end,
you will understand.
Here, try this on. See if it fits.
translation.es: Toma, pruébatelo. A ver si te queda.

translation.en: Is he CIA? Are you?
He's a DOD advisor, just like me. No, he's not.
translation.es: -Es un consultor, como yo... -No, no lo es.

translation.en: Just pay attention to Alejandro and if he says to do somethin', just do it.
translation.es: Solo hazle caso. Si te ordena hacer algo, hazlo.

translation.en: I'm not authorised to follow orders from Alejandro!
translation.es: ¡No estoy autorizada para seguir órdenes de Alejandro!

translation.en: Especially in Mexico! Fine. Then stay here.
But you don't want to, do you? I just wanna know what I'm getting into.
translation.es: -Pero no quieres eso, ¿verdad? -Quiero saber en qué me metí.

translation.en: Kate, you volunteered to get on this train because you know
translation.es: Kate, te ofreciste voluntaria porque sabías...

translation.en: you're doing nothing in Phoenix.
Yeah, you're just sweeping up a fucking mess.
In six months, every single house you raid will be rigged with explosives.
translation.es: En seis meses, cada casa en la que hagas una redada... ...estará llena de explosivos.

translation.en: Do you want to find the guys responsible? Yes or no?
translation.es: ¿Quieres encontrar a los responsables, sí o no?

translation.en: Yes.
- Yes? - Yes!
This is where we start.
Try it on.
(Steve) There she is.
The beast.
Juárez.
You know,
1900s, President Taft went to visit President Diaz.
translation.es: A principios de 1900, el presidente Taft visitó al presidente Díaz.

translation.en: Took 4,000 men with him.
And it almost was called off.
Some guy had a pistol.
Was gonna walk right up to Taft and just blow his brains out.
translation.es: Iba directo a Taft, para volarle los sesos.

translation.en: But it was avoided. 4,000 troops!
Think he felt safe? (Scoffs)
Welcome to Juárez.
It's brilliant what they do.
When they mutilate a body like that,
they make people think they must have been involved,
translation.es: ...le hacen creer a la gente que estaban metidos en algo...

translation.en: they must have deserved such a death cos they did something.
translation.es: ...le hacen creer a la gente que estaban metidos en algo... ...que merecían morir así por lo que hicieron.

translation.en: Oh, it's brilliant what they do.
(Steve) You hear that?
Those aren't firecrackers.
(Matt on radio) Mexicans are adjusting our route. There's activity ahead, we need to go around.
translation.es: Los mexicanos ajustan nuestra ruta. Hay actividad que debemos rodear.

translation.en: Everyone hold on.
Nothing will happen here.
They try anything, it will be at the border.
translation.es: Si intentan algo, será en la frontera.

translation.en: Keep an eye out for the State Police.
They're not always the good guys.
Spotter vehicle, left lane. Left lane!
(Man 1 on radio) Spotter vehicle, nine o'clock.
(Steve) I'm gettin' a boner.
(Man 1) Is that one of ours?
Watch the right, watch the right.
translation.es: Cuidado a la derecha. ¡A la derecha!

translation.en: (Matt) No, that's a lone wolf.
(Man 1) Eyes on rooftops.
(Man 2) Nothing. Rooftops clear.
(Pilot on radio) Bridge is one klick out.
translation.es: El puente está a un kilómetro.

translation.en: Road is clear. Hotfoot it, gentlemen.
(Matt) Everyone stay in this lane. Our agents at the border are
translation.es: Quédense en este carril. Nuestros agentes en la frontera...

translation.en: waving traffic through to get us over as quickly as they can.
translation.es: ...agilizan el tráfico para que crucemos lo antes posible.

translation.en: (Man 1) Everyone stay frosty.
(Man 2) OK, it's a fuck- up. What are we gonna do now?
(Pilot) Here's the deal, a car broke down up ahead.
translation.es: Esta es la situación. Un auto se averió más adelante.

translation.en: It's being sorted out, but it's gonna take a while. Stand by.
translation.es: Lo están arreglando, pero tardará un poco. Manténganse alerta.

translation.en: Get your service weapon out.
Red Impala, two lanes over, on my ten.
translation.es: Impala rojo, a dos carriles, a la izquierda.

translation.en: Copy that. Red Impala, two lanes left.
translation.es: Enterado. Impala rojo, dos carriles a la izquierda.

translation.en: (Man 1) Roger that.
Three lanes left. Seven o'clock. Green Civic.
translation.es: Tres carriles a la izquierda. Civic verde.

translation.en: Bring your window down.
(Alejandro) Gun.
Gun. Gun left! (Matt) What are the rules here?
(Man 1) We must be engaged to engage.
translation.es: No disparar si no nos disparan.

translation.en: (Man 2) Permission to get out of the vehicle and set a perimeter?
translation.es: Permiso para salir del vehículo y establecer un perímetro.

translation.en: (Man 1) Stay in your vehicle. You can do what they do. If they get out, you get out.
translation.es: Permanezcan en el vehículo. Hagan lo que ellos. Si salen, salgan.

translation.en: (Man 2) Get ready. They can see our lane clearing.
translation.es: Preparados. Pueden ver que nuestro carril se despeja.

translation.en: If it's coming, it's coming now.
translation.es: Si van a atacar, lo harán ahora.

translation.en: (Man 1) Move! (Kate) Wait, wait, wait.
Get outta the car.
Jesus Christ!
(Delta leader) Don't move! Cálmate!
No, no, no, no!
What the fuck are we doing?
Fuck!
(Delta 1) Lane's clear! The lane's clear!
(Delta leader) Don't look at me!
Put your hands behind your head! Go! Hands behind your head!
(Delta 2) All clear! (Delta 3) I got this!
Go, go, go!
(Delta leader) Move, move, move!
(Man 2 on radio) This is gonna be on the front page of every newspaper in America.
translation.es: Esto saldrá en la primera plana de todos los diarios en EE.UU.

translation.en: (Steve chuckles) No, it won't. It won't even make the papers in El Paso.
translation.es: No. Ni siquiera en los de El Paso.

translation.en: Clear!
(Matt) Got a little nutty, huh?
(Kate) Nutty? Yeah. Yeah, that was fucking illegal.
You wanna start a war? You're a fucking spook!
translation.es: ¿Quieres comenzar una guerra? ¡Eres un maldito espía!

translation.en: And him! I mean, who the fuck is that?
Told you, you could stay here.
translation.es: -Te dije que podías quedarte aquí. -¡Dios mío!

translation.en: Jesus Christ. Jesus Christ. You just spray bullets at...
translation.es: -Te dije que podías quedarte aquí. -¡Dios mío! Solo rociaste balas... Había malditos civiles por todos lados.

translation.en: Yeah, sure there's just fucking civilians everywhere.
translation.es: Solo rociaste balas... Había malditos civiles por todos lados.

translation.en: I'm not a soldier! This is not what I do! Whoa! Don't sell yourself short, all right?
translation.es: -¡No soy soldado! ¡No hago esto! -¡Cielos! No te subestimes, ¿sí?

translation.en: The reason Reggie's home is I know he wasn't ready for this.
translation.es: Decidí que Reggie no viniera porque no estaba listo para esto.

translation.en: But he better get ready real quick because this is the future, Kate!
translation.es: ¡Pero tiene que estarlo pronto, porque este es el futuro, Kate!

translation.en: Juárez is what happens when they dig in. This is it!
translation.es: ¡Juárez es lo que ocurre cuando se asientan!

translation.en: What am I doing here?
What you're doing here is you're giving us the opportunity to shake the tree and create chaos.
translation.es: Lo que haces es darnos la oportunidad de agitar las cosas y crear caos.

translation.en: That's what this is!
In the meantime, just sponge everything up you see.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, absorbe todo lo que veas.

translation.en: Learn! That's why you're here.
Guillermo...
You're giving him a belly full of water, you devil.
translation.es: Le estás llenando la barriga de agua, malvado.

translation.en: You didn't think we'd get you here, did you?
translation.es: No creíste que te traeríamos aquí, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I love it when they no hablo Inglés.
translation.es: Adoro cuando fingen no hablar inglés.

translation.en: You know, I brought an old buddy of yours.
translation.es: Te traje a un viejo amigo.

translation.en: I bet you hablo to him. Yeah.
translation.es: Apuesto a que hablarás con él. Sí.

translation.en: (Rafael) I didn't know ghosts got thirsty.
translation.es: No sabía que los fantasmas podían tener sed.

translation.en: I know someone kept him alive for us.
translation.es: Sé que alguien lo mantuvo vivo para nosotros.

translation.en: I doubt it was easy.
What's easy these days?
I'm sorry about what happened on the return. I control only what I can.
translation.es: Lamento lo sucedido al regreso. Controlo solo lo que puedo.

translation.en: (In English) It's not your fault.
There's rumours of a tunnel.
Fausto's main road into Arizona.
translation.es: La ruta de Fausto para llegar a Arizona.

translation.en: If you're doing what I think you're doing, that's the best place to cross.
translation.es: Si hacen lo que creo, es el mejor lugar para cruzar.

translation.en: If you can find it. But time is against you.
translation.es: Si pueden encontrarlo. Pero el tiempo está en su contra.

translation.en: In three days, nobody will be where they are today.
translation.es: En tres días, nadie estará donde están ahora.

translation.en: Shall we?
No, it's better if you don't. Something happens in that room,
translation.es: No, será mejor que no vayas. Si algo ocurre en esa habitación...

translation.en: it's easier to say you didn't see anything.
translation.es: ...es más fácil decir que no viste nada.

translation.en: Aw, Alejandro, I think he remembers you.
(Steve) I'm gonna step out.
Timmy.
What do you keep lookin' at me for?
No hablo Inglés, remember?
Can I have one of those?
Thank you.
- You like fireworks? - Huh?
Wanna see something cool?
Come on.
Here we go.
Look right there.
(Kate) Unbelievable.
(Man) That's what happens when you chop the head off a chicken.
translation.es: Eso pasa cuando le cortan la cabeza a una gallina.

translation.en: - (Kate) Yeah. - (Sirens wailing)
I can see.
(Matt) Can you get 'em all in one place?
We just landed back in Phoenix. I'm on a clock, I can't wait.
translation.es: Recién volvimos a Phoenix. No tengo tiempo. No puedo esperar.

translation.en: All right, look, contact Bob Fisks. Have him hold 'em in the staging area.
translation.es: Bien, contacta a Bob Fisks. Que los mantenga en el punto de reunión.

translation.en: Yeah. How long does it take to get to Tucson?
(Kate) Um, from here it's a little over two hours.
translation.es: Desde aquí, más de dos horas.

translation.en: All right. We'll be there around 2:00. Yeah.
(Kate) Are we going to Tucson?
Yeah, you gotta learn how to sleep on a plane.
translation.es: Sí, tienes que aprender a dormir en un avión.

translation.en: They let me on the base when you need a ride, don't they? You OK?
translation.es: Solo me dejan entrar cuando usted necesita que lo lleven, ¿no?

translation.en: - She's fine. - (Reggie) I didn't ask you.
And yet I answered.
translation.es: -No le pregunté a usted. -Y aun así respondí.

translation.en: (Whispers) Kate,
who's that?
We're goin' to Tucson.
(Bob) What's the deal, Matt? Why you holdin' up my transport?
translation.es: ¿Qué ocurre, Matt? ¿Por qué retrasas mi transporte?

translation.en: (Matt) Don't worry, Bob. We'll be quick.
How's the auditor gonna react to
translation.es: Tranquilo, Bob. No tardaremos. ¿Cómo reaccionará el auditor ante un recibo de 8 mil dólares de pizza?

translation.en: an $8,000 cheque to fuckin' Domino's Pizza?
translation.es: ¿Cómo reaccionará el auditor ante un recibo de 8 mil dólares de pizza?

translation.en: Don't be so dramatic, OK? This is Kate Macer with the FBI.
translation.es: No seas dramático, ¿sí? Kate Macer, del FBI.

translation.en: This is her partner, what's- his- name. It was her call. Yeah, it wasn't my call. Have you got another one of those?
translation.es: -Y su compañero. Fue su decisión. -No lo fue. ¿Tiene otro de esos?

translation.en: Finish it before you get up there. No problem.
Hey, Kate.
Tell me what happened in El Paso.
translation.es: Cuéntame lo que pasó en El Paso.

translation.en: We weren't in El Paso. We were in Mexico.
translation.es: No estuvimos en El Paso. Estuvimos en México.

translation.en: (Bob) I guess we're not following any procedures.
translation.es: Supongo que no seguimos ningún procedimiento.

translation.en: What do you wanna do?
We want to talk to the people caught around the Nogales area.
translation.es: Queremos hablar con la gente que atraparon en Nogales.

translation.en: OK. That group.
This group here. And that group.
translation.es: Este grupo y el de allá.

translation.en: OK. They stay and the rest can go.
translation.es: Bien, ellos se quedan y los demás pueden irse.

translation.en: (Bob) Josef!
(Bob) On the bus. Ándale.
What are we looking for?
Just keep watching.
Talk to me. What are we doing? I don't have any answers for you.
Let's get some, then.
Do you think I haven't asked these questions? Do you think you can do better?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no he preguntado? ¿Que puedes hacerlo mejor?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Go ahead.
Matt, can we talk for a minute?
What's up?
Everything OK?
You look very serious.
There's in the dark and there's the way you're treating us.
translation.es: No está claro qué es lo que hacemos aquí.

translation.en: I want to know the objective or I walk, period.
translation.es: Quiero saber el objetivo o me voy, punto.

translation.en: Then go. I didn't ask you to be here. She did.
translation.es: Pues vete. Yo no pedí que estuvieras aquí. Ella lo hizo.

translation.en: I walk, too.
- (Matt) What do you wanna know? - Everything.
Fuckin' lawyers.
All right.
Guillermo
told us about a tunnel east of Nogales, near Sasabe.
translation.es: ...nos contó sobre un túnel al este de Nogales, cerca de Sásabe.

translation.en: Now we're tryin' to find out what areas near there migrants avoid
translation.es: Intentamos averiguar qué áreas cerca de ahí evitan los migrantes...

translation.en: so we can find the tunnel.
translation.es: Intentamos averiguar qué áreas cerca de ahí evitan los migrantes... ...para encontrar el túnel.

translation.en: - That better? - (Reggie) And Guillermo is...
Guillermo, he just told you where the drug tunnel is?
translation.es: ¿Guillermo te dijo dónde está el túnel? ¿Así nada más?

translation.en: - He just told you? - Guillermo didn't have any other options.
translation.es: ¿Guillermo te dijo dónde está el túnel? ¿Así nada más? Guillermo no tenía otras opciones. Si lo regresamos a México...

translation.en: We send him back across the border, he's a dead man.
translation.es: Guillermo no tenía otras opciones. Si lo regresamos a México...

translation.en: Now he gets to spend the next 30 years in an American prison,
translation.es: ...es hombre muerto. Ahora pasará 30 años... ...en una cárcel estadounidense...

translation.en: in relative safety. (Reggie) Just tell us the truth, man.
We are gonna make enough noise
that Manuel Diaz is called back to Mexico to see his boss.
translation.es: ...que harán volver a Manuel Díaz a México para ver a su jefe.

translation.en: That's the truth. (Reggie) And then?
And then we know where his boss is.
translation.es: Entonces sabremos dónde está su jefe.

translation.en: His name is Fausto Alarcon. El Verdugo.
Every day across that border,
translation.es: Todos los días en la frontera, secuestran...

translation.en: people are kidnapped or killed by his hand or with his blessing.
translation.es: Todos los días en la frontera, secuestran... ...o asesinan a gente por su mano o con su bendición.

translation.en: To find him would be like discovering a vaccine.
You understand the value of that.
All right, we're good. Just don't keep us in the dark.
translation.es: Bien, no hay problema. Pero no nos oculten cosas.

translation.en: Great!
You afraid of the dark?
(Matt) Hey!
It's been a humdinger of a day. Go home. Get some rest.
translation.es: Ha sido un día maravilloso. Vayan a casa. Descansen.

translation.en: We'll find our own ride. We'll see you tomorrow!
translation.es: Nos las arreglaremos para irnos. ¡Nos vemos mañana!

translation.en: I just drove a hundred fucking miles. (Kate) It's a fucking blessing, trust me.
translation.es: -Conduje cientos de kilómetros... -Es una bendición, créeme.

translation.en: Got you smokin' again? Yeah.
(Reggie) Who the fuck's Guillermo?
Gotta get you a new bra, woman.
The list of things I need. I'm just saying, you know. Some nice lacy somethin'.
translation.es: -Necesito tantas cosas. -Solo decía. Algo lindo y de encaje.

translation.en: It's been a while since someone's seen me in a bra, except you.
translation.es: Ha pasado tiempo desde que alguien vio mi sostén, solo tú.

translation.en: Oh, God, don't look at me like that. I don't want your pity.
translation.es: Cielos, no me mires así. No quiero tu lástima.

translation.en: How was seeing Evan the other day?
I don't know...
- Miss him? - Ask me something else.
translation.es: -No lo sé... -¿Lo extrañas? Pregúntame otra cosa.

translation.en: You know, I used to see guys like Matt in Iraq. Gotta be careful around these people.
translation.es: Conocí a tipos como Matt en Iraq. Debes tener cuidado con ellos.

translation.en: CIA's not supposed to work this side of the fence.
translation.es: La CIA no trabaja de ese lado de la frontera.

translation.en: (Kate) He's a DOD advisor. You really believe that?
translation.es: -Es consultor del Depto. de Defensa. -¿En serio lo crees?

translation.en: You need somebody watching your six, cos I promise you they aren't.
translation.es: Necesitas a alguien que te cuide la espalda, ellos no lo harán.

translation.en: You know,
we're not even scratching the surface doing what we're doing.
translation.es: Ni siquiera hemos raspado la superficie... ...haciendo lo que hacemos. Y ellos sí.

translation.en: And they are.
translation.es: ...haciendo lo que hacemos. Y ellos sí.

translation.en: Mmm. Well, you sure picked the motherfuckers to show us.
translation.es: Elegiste a los tipos indicados para que nos enseñen.

translation.en: What's the password?
Moron.
This is our spot.
- (All) No way! No, no. - (Man laughing)
translation.es: Este es el sitio. ¡Ni hablar! ¡Ni hablar! No, no.

translation.en: - Are you getting this? - Mmm- hmm.
(Alejandro) That's our way across.
So Guillermo was tellin' the truth.
It's gonna be a good day.
Hey, Kate. Got any friends at Phoenix SWAT?
translation.es: Kate. ¿Tienes amigos en el equipo SWAT de Phoenix?

translation.en: Uh, yeah, we use them in breaches all the time.
translation.es: Sí, nos apoyan en situaciones extremas.

translation.en: Good, cos we're gonna need their help. What for?
We are gonna fuck with Manuel Diaz's wallet.
translation.es: Arruinaremos la billetera de Manuel Díaz.

translation.en: (Matt) This is our Smurf, guys. Blonde hair, white purse.
translation.es: Ella es nuestrapitufina. La rubia del bolso blanco.

translation.en: - You know the Heimlich? - (Jessie) Oh, yeah.
She tries to eat that deposit receipt, you Heimlich it right out of her, hear me?
translation.es: Si intenta comerse ese comprobante, sácaselo. ¿Me oíste?

translation.en: Copy that.
translation.es: Si intenta comerse ese comprobante, sácaselo. ¿Me oíste? Entendido.

translation.en: (Matt exhales)
There she goes. All right, go get 'em, tiger.
translation.es: Allá va. Bien, ve por ella, tigre.

translation.en: Take 'em.
Get down!
You want bank computers for evidence?
No, no. Just the money. But freeze all his accounts, everything.
translation.es: No, no. Solo el dinero. Pero congelen sus cuentas. Todo.

translation.en: Even if his dog opened an account, I want you to freeze it.
translation.es: Si su perro tiene una, quiero que la congelen.

translation.en: - What you got? - (Clatters)
Got a mobile money launderer.
Pack it up.
You coming?
No, don't go in the bank. This is something we can actually build a case on.
translation.es: -No, no entres al banco. -Con esto podemos armar el caso.

translation.en: Don't go in the bank, Kate! There you go, and she's goin' in the bank.
translation.es: ¡Kate, no entres al banco! Y lo hará, va a entrar.

translation.en: (Kate) These are all Manuel Diaz's accounts?
(Man) Yeah. Cash deposits made daily in $9,000 increments.
translation.es: Sí. Depósitos en efectivo por nueve mil dólares hechos todos los días.

translation.en: - So, it doesn't have to be reported. - That's right.
And you can seize those?
I already have. And I'll go through these wire transfer numbers and
translation.es: -¿Puede incautarlos? -Ya lo hice. Seguiré esos números de transferencia y congelaré esas cuentas también.

translation.en: freeze all these accounts as well.
translation.es: Seguiré esos números de transferencia y congelaré esas cuentas también.

translation.en: Here you go.
(Man) Oh, damn, that's smart. (Kate) What?
This is a bank line of credit.
translation.es: Es una línea de crédito bancaria.

translation.en: See, you make payments over what you owe
translation.es: Hace pagos de lo que debe y no se muestran como efectivo...

translation.en: and it doesn't show up as cash, it shows up as a negative loan balance.
translation.es: Hace pagos de lo que debe y no se muestran como efectivo... ...sino como un saldo de préstamo negativo.

translation.en: It's never reported to anyone. IRS, DEA...
translation.es: Nunca se le reporta a nadie, ni a Hacienda ni a la DEA.

translation.en: This money is invisible.
translation.es: Nunca se le reporta a nadie, ni a Hacienda ni a la DEA. Este dinero es invisible.

translation.en: How much does he have?
Take a look.
Oh, my God.
They just seized $17 million.
- It's a bogus bust, Kate. - What?
You can't prosecute it.
translation.es: -Es un arresto falso, Kate. -¿Qué? No se procesa. Nadie controla quién deposita dinero en una cuenta.

translation.en: No one controls who deposits money in an account.
translation.es: No se procesa. Nadie controla quién deposita dinero en una cuenta.

translation.en: An attorney will have that money back in a few months,
translation.es: No se procesa. Nadie controla quién deposita dinero en una cuenta. Un abogado recuperará el dinero, pero muchos serán castigados.

translation.en: but a lot of heads will roll before that.
translation.es: Un abogado recuperará el dinero, pero muchos serán castigados.

translation.en: But we can arrest Manuel for now. We can get him off the street.
translation.es: Un abogado recuperará el dinero, pero muchos serán castigados. Podemos arrestar a Manuel. Sacarlo de las calles...

translation.en: We gotta get Manuel called back to Mexico. That's the objective.
translation.es: Tenemos que conseguir que regrese a México. Ese es el objetivo.

translation.en: We have no jurisdiction in Mexico. We have nothing. We need to do something now.
translation.es: No tenemos jurisdicción en México. Nada. Tenemos que hacer algo ya.

translation.en: Can't arrest him.
(Manuel) What?
When?
Wait a minute.
$9,000 is deposited into this account every day, in cash,
translation.es: 9 mil dólares han sido depositados en esta cuenta todos los días...

translation.en: for five years.
It's not illegal. It's suspect, but it isn't illegal.
translation.es: No es ilegal, sospechoso sí, pero no ilegal.

translation.en: I think the IRS might think it's illegal. What do you want, Kate? What would you like done here?
translation.es: -Hacienda pensaría que lo es. -¿Qué quieres? ¿Qué te gustaría hacer?

translation.en: I want to follow some semblance of procedure.
translation.es: Quiero seguir algo parecido a un procedimiento.

translation.en: That's what I want. To build a prosecutable case.
translation.es: Quiero seguir algo parecido a un procedimiento. Eso quiero. Armar un caso que pueda procesar.

translation.en: We prosecuted more felony drug cases in this region last year
translation.es: Eso quiero. Armar un caso que pueda procesar. Procesamos más casos de drogas en esta región el año pasado...

translation.en: than in the two previous years combined.
translation.es: Procesamos más casos de drogas en esta región el año pasado... ...que en los dos años anteriores juntos.

translation.en: Are you feeling that on the street?
You getting the vibe that we're winning?
No.
(Jennings) Do you?
No, sir, I don't.
Advisors like Matt come in, they stir the pot,
translation.es: Consultores como Matt vienen, arman un alboroto...

translation.en: they cause the criminals to react and make mistakes.
translation.es: Consultores como Matt vienen, arman un alboroto... ...hacen que los criminales reaccionen y cometan errores.

translation.en: That's how we build cases against the individuals
translation.es: ...hacen que los criminales reaccionen y cometan errores. Así construimos casos contra los individuos...

translation.en: that actually make a difference in this fight.
translation.es: ...que hacen la diferencia en esta lucha.

translation.en: It's when they're nervous, when they stop trusting their crews,
translation.es: Es cuando están nerviosos, cuando dejan de confiar...

translation.en: when they move their money.
translation.es: ...en sus equipos, cuando se mueve su dinero.

translation.en: These are all opportunities to strike.
translation.es: Esas son las oportunidades para atacar.

translation.en: And that's the purpose of people like Matt.
translation.es: Y ese es el propósito de gente como Matt.

translation.en: (Jennings) Kate, this isn't something that I dreamed up myself.
translation.es: Kate, esto no es algo que me inventé.

translation.en: I don't have the authority to hire advisors
translation.es: No tengo la autoridad para contratar consultores...

translation.en: or authorise joint agency missions,
or fly agents from Air Force bases.
translation.es: ...o enviar agentes desde bases aéreas militares.

translation.en: Are you understanding me?
These decisions are made far from here
translation.es: Estas decisiones las tomaron lejos de aquí...

translation.en: by officials elected to office, not appointed to them.
So if your fear is operating out of bounds,
translation.es: Si tu temor es operar de manera ilegal...

translation.en: I am telling you, you are not.
translation.es: Si tu temor es operar de manera ilegal... ...te digo que no es así.

translation.en: The boundary's been moved.
Are we clear?
(Kate) Yes, sir.
I need a fucking drink.
- Where you wanna go? - Anywhere.
translation.es: -Necesito un trago. -¿A dónde quieres ir? A donde sea.

translation.en: I'm gonna go get a table.
- I guess it's on me. - Thanks.
- (Bartender) What'll it be? - Two beers.
Thank you.
I want a cigarette so bad.
Yeah?
I hate to go on about this,
translation.es: Odio decirte esto de nuevo, pero...

translation.en: but I think the bra situation's the least of your problems. OK...
translation.es: ...creo que lo del sostén es el menor de tus problemas.

translation.en: - Cos you look like shit. - (Laughs)
You do. You look like shit. Everybody on the team's talkin' about it.
translation.es: En serio. Te ves terrible. Todos en el equipo lo dicen.

translation.en: They're like, Kate used to be a number one draft pick.
translation.es: Dicen: Kate solía ser la más atractiva.

translation.en: Now look at her. She looks like fuckin' shit.
translation.es: Dicen: Kate solía ser la más atractiva. Ahora mírenla. Se ve horrible.

translation.en: Look at you. Your eyebrows are a mess.
translation.es: Ahora mírenla. Se ve horrible. Mírate. Tus cejas son un desastre.

translation.en: No, they're not!
translation.es: Mírate. Tus cejas son un desastre.

translation.en: They're like caterpillars, like wild beasts. You're losing weight...
translation.es: -¡Claro que no! -Son como orugas... -...bestias salvajes. Has perdido peso. -Sí como.

translation.en: I'm eating.
Look at you. What is it, one T- shirt a week?
translation.es: ¿Usas la misma camiseta toda la semana?

translation.en: At least work on your personal hygiene, huh?
translation.es: Tienes que trabajar en tu higiene personal.

translation.en: You sound like my mother. Maybe I am your mother.
translation.es: -Pareces mi mamá. -Tal vez soy tu mamá.

translation.en: First we work on personal hygiene, then we move on to the shopping.
translation.es: Primero trabajaremos tu higiene. Después, compraremos comida.

translation.en: Get you some potatoes, yeah? Eat some food...
translation.es: Te conseguiremos papas, algo de comida...

translation.en: Where have you taken me? What is this place?
translation.es: ¿A dónde me trajiste? ¿Qué es este lugar?

translation.en: It's a bar. It's full of cowboys.
I'm a cowboy.
You're a redneck?
I'm a redneck. Got a trailer. Got a wife.
translation.es: Eres un pueblerino. Soy un pueblerino. Tengo un camión y una esposa.

translation.en: - (Chuckles) - What are you talking about?
I got a trailer, I got a wife. She's my sister.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Tengo un camión y una esposa, es mi hermana.

translation.en: (Both laughing)
translation.es: Tengo un camión y una esposa, es mi hermana.

translation.en: (Man) Big Reg.
- Ted! - What's goin' on, man?
- Long time. How you been? - (Ted) Yeah, it's good to see you, man.
translation.es: -¡Ted! -¿Qué hay? -Cuánto tiempo. ¿Cómo estás? -Qué gusto verte, amigo.

translation.en: (Reggie) Good to see you, too. How you been?
(Ted) Gettin' your groove on, huh?
No, man. We just started. We just got here.
translation.es: -Igualmente. ¿Cómo has estado? -¿Te pones en ambiente? Apenas comenzamos. Acabamos de llegar.

translation.en: All right. You, uh...
- Gonna introduce me, man? - Oh.
Ted, Phoenix PD, Kate, my partner.
translation.es: Bien. ¿No me presentas? Ted, Policía de Phoenix. Kate, mi compañera.

translation.en: How you doin'? Just Ted's fine. I saw you play softball once.
translation.es: -¿Cómo estás? Solo llámame Ted. -Te vi juzgar softball una vez.

translation.en: - Softball? - (Chuckles)
(Reggie) She was at the game, Ted.
translation.es: Ted, ella estuvo en el partido.

translation.en: The game?
Aw...
translation.es: El partido. Cuando te poncharon con una pelota muy fácil.

translation.en: (Reggie) Where you struck out in slow- pitch softball.
translation.es: Cuando te poncharon con una pelota muy fácil.

translation.en: You played really, really well.
translation.es: Cuando te poncharon con una pelota muy fácil. -Jugaste muy, muy bien. -Te lo agradezco.

translation.en: (Ted) Yeah, I appreciate that.
I'm gonna head back to that bar now. Well, can I get y'all another round?
translation.es: Voy a la barra. ¿Les traigo otra ronda?

translation.en: - (Kate) Yeah, sure. - Cool. All right.
Ted, he's a good guy.
Divorced.
Just give me one second, I'll be right with you.
translation.es: Dame un segundo. Ahora te alcanzo.

translation.en: All right...
Just wait, wait, wait a second...
What, what, what? Is that too much?
translation.es: -Espera, espera un momento. -¿Qué, qué? -¿Voy muy rápido? -Solo dame un segundo.

translation.en: Just wait one minute. I just need a second.
All right. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
Hey, Kate?
Hey! Hey, come here, stop, stop, talk to me.
Just talk to me. OK? Relax. OK? Just take it...
translation.es: ¡Oye! Ven acá. Detente, detente. Háblame. Háblame. ¿Sí? Tranquila. Tranquila. Solo...

translation.en: Whoa, shit! Kate...
What is it? What? Stop.
Stop. Stop.
Shit, what the fuck is wrong with you?
- Don't... - What the fuck are you...
You fuckin' try to shoot me? You fuckin' crazy?
- Stop that! - Get off me!
(Ted) Fuck that...
Damn it, Kate! Just fucking stop!
Stop, bitch! Stop! Fuck!
Fuckin' stop!
- Stop. Shh. - (Choking)
Fuck!
This is you, you hear me? You did this. You did this.
translation.es: Tú lo provocaste, ¿me oyes? Tú lo hiciste. Tú lo hiciste.

translation.en: You used me as bait.
Nah, you used yourself as bait.
translation.es: No, tú te usaste como carnada.

translation.en: I told you not to go in the bank.
translation.es: Te dije que no entraras al banco.

translation.en: You brought him back here, though. That was smart.
translation.es: Pero tú lo trajiste acá. Eso fue muy inteligente.

translation.en: Yeah. Love how we're gonna pretend like I planned this.
translation.es: Sí. Me encanta que finjamos que yo lo planeé.

translation.en: Why don't you just write that in your report.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo escribes en tu informe?

translation.en: Come on! This is good news!
They're gonna call Manuel back soon.
Isn't that the point?
(Kate) It's OK, Reg.
I thought he was a friend. (Kate) I know.
- Want me to stay tonight? - No. I'm good.
translation.es: -¿Quieres que me quede esta noche? -No, estoy bien.

translation.en: - You sure? - I'm good.
(Ted) How y'all want me to talk to you when you keep fuckin' hittin' me?
translation.es: ¿Cómo quieren que hable si siguen golpeándome?

translation.en: How many other corrupt motherfuckers are you workin' with on this side of the border?
translation.es: ¿Con cuántos infelices corruptos trabajas de este lado de la frontera?

translation.en: All right. Look...
It's exactly what I told you, all right? They just...
translation.es: Es justo como se los dije, ¿sí? Ellos...

translation.en: They came to me and they wanted details about our case
translation.es: ...se acercaron a mí y querían saber detalles sobre el caso...

translation.en: and, yes, I did it. I gave it to them, but I never wanted anybody to get hurt.
translation.es: ...se acercaron a mí y querían saber detalles sobre el caso... ...y sí, se los dije, pero nunca quise que lastimaran a nadie.

translation.en: I would never gotten involved with them pieces of shit
translation.es: ...y sí, se los dije, pero nunca quise que lastimaran a nadie. No me habría involucrado con esos infelices si...

translation.en: - if I thought that there was any... - Ahh! Fuck! OK!
translation.es: No me habría involucrado con esos infelices si... ¡Carajo! ¡De acuerdo!

translation.en: (Groans) OK! Fuck! OK!
(Matt) OK, OK, OK, is not what we're lookin' for, Ted.
translation.es: Esa no es la respuesta que buscamos, Ted.

translation.en: You know what the beauty is of you being so beat to a pulp?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es lo hermoso de que estés tan golpeado?

translation.en: Cos no one's gonna notice a few more scratches.
translation.es: Que nadie notará unos rasguños más.

translation.en: This is a new deal, Ted.
I'm the one who decides whether your daughter'll get Federal protection...
translation.es: Yo soy quien decide si tu hija recibe protección federal...

translation.en: (Matt) Or whether we post your ex- wife's address on the Internet.
translation.es: ...o si publicamos la dirección de tu exmujer en Internet.

translation.en: I decide whether you go to prison in a work camp in Missouri,
translation.es: Yo decido si vas a una tranquila prisión en Missouri...

translation.en: or a kill house like Corcoran.
This is where you negotiate how to survive, my friend.
translation.es: Ahora es cuando negocias cómo vas a sobrevivir, amigo.

translation.en: OK. Look...
I feel like this whole thing's just gotten away from me...
translation.es: Creo que la situación se me salió de control...

translation.en: I fucked up. OK, I fucked up and I'm in over my fuckin' head right now.
translation.es: Cometí un error. Estoy en un problema y no puedo solucionarlo.

translation.en: I'm sorry... Ahh!
Fuck! Get it out! Get it the fuck out!
Fuck! Get it the fuck out! Get it out!
Motherfucker! And fuck you!
Fuck!
How many officers do they have working on the force?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos oficiales tienen trabajando en la policía?

translation.en: I'll tell you everything you wanna know.
translation.es: Les diré todo lo que quieran saber.

translation.en: You just gotta promise me that my daughter's gonna be safe, OK?
translation.es: Solo prométanme que mi hija estará a salvo, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: You make me that promise.
You want the truth?
Please.
Give me all the names
of all the motherfuckers they got working on the force.
translation.es: ...de todos los infelices que trabajan en la policía.

translation.en: (Ted) OK, OK...
translation.es: ...de todos los infelices que trabajan en la policía. Bien, bien.

translation.en: - All right? - OK...
OK. So which phone do we start with?
It's in that one. It's that shitty one.
translation.es: Está en ese. En esa porquería.

translation.en: - That's the shitty one? - Yes, sir!
(Alejandro) How you feelin'?
- Better. - Uh- huh.
Well, you should've shot him.
I just tried to have sex with my hitman.
translation.es: Intenté tener sexo con mi asesino.

translation.en: Nah. He's no assassin.
He just wanted to know what you know.
They're after us, not you.
translation.es: Nos persiguen a nosotros, no a ti.

translation.en: Thank you.
You remind me of someone very special to me.
translation.es: Me recuerdas a alguien muy especial para mí.

translation.en: Get some rest.
Tomorrow they'll call Manuel Diaz back to Mexico
translation.es: Mañana regresarán a Manuel Díaz a México...

translation.en: and we'll cut a leg from them.
(Man 1 on radio) Hello, sixty.
(Man 2 on radio) We have eyes on the objective.
Can we get a closer visual?
Ten metres going down east of the ridge.
translation.es: Diez metros hacia la cresta este.

translation.en: Come on in.
Tasty beverage?
OK, boys.
(Kate) What's going on? What's the plan? We're going hunting.
translation.es: -¿Qué hay? ¿Cuál es el plan? -Iremos de cacería.

translation.en: Looks like Manuel Diaz is being called back to Mexico.
translation.es: Parece que regresaron a Manuel Díaz a México.

translation.en: Just waiting for confirmation.
There's the tunnel right there.
(Delta leader) All right, listen up.
Let's clarify the op.
We're gonna drive to location, proceed on foot...
translation.es: Iremos a la ubicación a pie...

translation.en: - How are you? - Good. How are you?
- I'm fine. - How's the neck?
It's better, thank you. Good, good.
(Delta leader) These diagrams are based on other tunnels that have been mapped.
translation.es: Estos diagramas están basados en otros túneles que se han trazado.

translation.en: They're for reference only, they're not accurate.
translation.es: Solo son una referencia. No son precisos.

translation.en: Once on the Mexican side of the border, there'll be a small staging area,
translation.es: En cuanto estemos del lado mexicano, habrá un punto de encuentro...

translation.en: then another shaft will lead to the main warehouse
translation.es: ...y otro túnel nos dirigirá a la bodega principal...

translation.en: and the road that returns to Mexico.
translation.es: ...y al camino que conduce a México.

translation.en: Once we clear the mules, we don't expect more than a dozen bandits.
translation.es: Sin contar a las mulas, no esperamos a más de una docena de criminales.

translation.en: No. They use Mexican police for vehicle transport.
translation.es: No, usan a la policía para transportar la droga.

translation.en: If you see a uniform in the tunnel, consider him a bandit, too.
translation.es: Si ven un policía en el túnel, considérenlo también un criminal.

translation.en: OK. Uh, you want to discuss ROE?
- Nah, we'll save that for later. - OK.
This is an in and out. We're clearing, placing an agent.
translation.es: Entramos y salimos. Aseguramos el área y dejamos un agente.

translation.en: It's all about creating a diversion. (Matt) Want the mother of all diversions, boys.
translation.es: -Se trata de generar una distracción. -La más grande de todas, chicos.

translation.en: Need a lot of noise. Fourth of July on steroids. (Delta team laughing)
translation.es: Necesitamos mucho ruido. Como un 4 de julio, pero más escandaloso.

translation.en: (Delta leader) All right. Weapons check. Let's go, boys.
translation.es: Muy bien. Armas listas. Vamos, chicos.

translation.en: This looks like confirmation.
- I need to fit your guy with a locator. - Yeah, do it.
translation.es: -Debo poner el localizador a su agente. -Hazlo.

translation.en: (Reggie) Those are Special Ops. Are we going in on this?
Nah. You guys aren't really dressed for it. Well, you didn't fuckin' tell us.
translation.es: -No están vestidos para la ocasión. -¿En serio?

translation.en: Yeah, well, you two went cryin' to Daddy yesterday, and we - don't want Daddy to know everything. - Oh, give me a fucking break!
translation.es: Ayer fueron a llorar con papá y no queremos que papá se entere de todo.

translation.en: All right, we'll get you some extra gear. (Kate) We have tac gear in the car.
translation.es: -Les conseguiremos equipo extra. -Tenemos unos en el auto.

translation.en: All right. Good. You guys will hang back when we get there, OK?
Then why are we going?
Cos CIA can't operate within US borders...
translation.es: La CIA no puede operar en la frontera de EE.UU...

translation.en: (Both) Without a domestic agency attached.
translation.es: ...sin la colaboración de una agencia federal.

translation.en: I told you you'd be useful.
So that's it. That's why I'm here.
translation.es: Eso es. Por eso estoy aquí.

translation.en: (Matt) Yeah, that's it.
That's why you're here.
Hey, we find any drugs, you guys get to confiscate 'em. It's gonna be a big day.
translation.es: Si encontramos drogas, ustedes las incautan. Será un gran día.

translation.en: Un- fucking real!
- Front and back. - Kate.
Kate, come on. Fuck these people, man. They've been using us from the beginning.
translation.es: -Trasero y delantero. -Kate, por favor. Al diablo con ellos. Nos han usado desde el principio.

translation.en: We don't have to do this. I need to know what they used us for.
translation.es: -No tenemos que hacerlo. -Debo saber para qué nos usaron.

translation.en: - Doesn't matter what! - Yes, it does!
I say we walk. We walk and make them eat this whole fucked- up operation.
translation.es: Yo digo que nos vayamos y arruinemos su maldita operación.

translation.en: No. I have to know.
(Man on radio) Black Mercedes... Plate number, Romeo- India- November
three- one- Bravo- seven. Heading south by southeast.
translation.es: Mercedes negro. Matrícula: Romeo-India-Noviembre... ...tres-uno-Bravo-siete. Se dirige al sur por el sureste.

translation.en: (Matt) Where?
- OK. - (Mobile phone beeps)
We gotta hit the tunnel the minute we get on the ground.
translation.es: Tenemos que entrar al túnel en cuanto lleguemos.

translation.en: Pretty exciting, huh?
(Matt) What is target's location?
(Man on radio) 14 miles south of Nogales heading west, rapidly.
translation.es: 22 kilómetros al sur de Nogales, dirigiéndose al oeste rápidamente.

translation.en: Keep your fuckin' safeties on, barrels pointed down.
translation.es: No quiten los seguros de sus armas, bajen el cañón.

translation.en: Stay in the back.
Don't shoot anyone on my fuckin' team. Right?
translation.es: No le disparen a nadie de mi maldito equipo. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: (Delta leader) Gear check?
Thermal camera, check.
Night vision goggles, check. (Delta 1) Get those guys.
translation.es: -Lentes de visión nocturna, listos. -Vamos por ellos.

translation.en: (Delta leader) Wanna take Alpha squad, I'll take B squad?
translation.es: ¿Quiere tomar al equipo Alfa y yo tomo el otro?

translation.en: - You got it. Let's do it. - (Delta leader) Let's go, boys.
(Delta leader) Control, you copy?
(Man on radio) Roger, Alpha. We read.
(Man on radio) Fifty meters. Your three o'clock, Alpha.
translation.es: Cincuenta metros. Alfa, están a 90 grados.

translation.en: (Delta leader on radio) Stand by. Getting close to objective.
(Man on radio) Alpha, Bravo, be advised. 12 metres straight ahead.
(Matt) All right, we need to boogie and we need to do it quiet till we find the centre.
translation.es: Tenemos que movernos rápido y en silencio hasta encontrar el centro.

translation.en: (Alejandro) Draw the fighters to you and make some noise.
translation.es: Atráiganlos hacia ustedes y hagan ruido.

translation.en: Don't follow me. I'll be fine.
(Delta leader) What are the rules of engagement?
(Matt) Weapons free, my friend. Weapons free.
translation.es: Usen sus armas con libertad. Úsenlas con libertad.

translation.en: (Delta leader) Weapons free, boys.
(Matt) Good luck.
- You OK? - My gun!
Leave it. Stay on my six.
(In English) Freeze!
Step away from him.
(Alejandro) Put that down. I mean it! Move away from him right now!
translation.es: -Baja el arma. -Hablo en serio. ¡Aléjate de él ahora!

translation.en: Don't ever point a weapon at me again. (Gasps)
translation.es: Jamás vuelvas a apuntarme con un arma.

translation.en: Catch your breath. Then get back up there.
translation.es: Recupera el aliento. Luego vuelve allá.

translation.en: I am through. Do you have my location?
(Man on radio) Roger, we have you. Target is east and north of you.
translation.es: Afirmativo, te tenemos. El objetivo está al este y al norte.

translation.en: Looks like Highway 56 to 17. Will intercept him if he stays on 17.
translation.es: Parece que la 56 cruza con la 17... ...te interceptarán si permaneces en la 17.

translation.en: Go east on 56 off Highway 2.
translation.es: Ve al este por la 56 y toma la salida 2.

translation.en: Wilco.
(Matt) Is he through yet?
(Man on radio) We have joy. GPS is transmitting. Audio is transmitting.
translation.es: Buenas noticias. El GPS está transmitiendo. El audio también.

translation.en: Should intercept in 20.
(Matt) That was a clean, clean fucking op, my friend.
translation.es: Esa fue una operación perfectamente ejecutada, mi amigo.

translation.en: (Delta leader) Except for these two assholes.
Well, you're better overseas. You don't have to babysit.
translation.es: Estás mejor en el extranjero. No cuidas niños.

translation.en: Where's Kate?
translation.es: Estás mejor en el extranjero. No cuidas niños. ¿Dónde está Kate?

translation.en: I thought she was with you.
We gotta go back.
Oh, shit. Boys, we're missin' one. Let's go.
- (Delta 1) Whoa, whoa! - (Grunts)
Just lay back, baby. Let it happen.
Stop. Stop moving.
(Grunts) Get off me!
Stop moving! Stop!
Stop it.
Just relax. Just relax.
All right? You gonna stay there?
Are you gonna stay there?
All right.
Now, you listen.
You went up the wrong tunnel.
You saw things you shouldn't have seen.
translation.es: Viste cosas que no deberías haber visto.

translation.en: What is Medellín?
(Matt) Medellín?
Medellín refers to a time
translation.es: Medellín se refiere a una época...

translation.en: when one group controlled every aspect of the drug trade,
translation.es: ...en la que un solo grupo controlaba todo el tráfico de drogas...

translation.en: providing a measure of order that we could control.
translation.es: ...y brindaba cierto orden que podíamos controlar.

translation.en: And until somebody finds a way to convince 20% of the population
translation.es: Hasta que alguien convenza al 20% de la población...

translation.en: to stop snorting and smoking that shit,
translation.es: ...de dejar de inhalar y fumar esa porquería...

translation.en: order's the best we can hope for.
And what you saw up there
was Alejandro working toward returning that order.
translation.es: ...fue a Alejandro intentando restablecer ese orden.

translation.en: (Kate) Alejandro works for the fucking Colombian Cartel.
translation.es: Alejandro trabaja para el maldito cártel colombiano.

translation.en: He works for the competition.
Alejandro works for anyone
who will point him toward the people who made him.
translation.es: ...que lo lleve hacia la gente que lo convirtió en esto.

translation.en: Us.
Them.
Anyone who will turn him loose.
So he can get the person that cut off his wife's head,
translation.es: Para que pueda dar... ...con quien le cortó la cabeza a su mujer...

translation.en: and threw his daughter into a vat of acid.
translation.es: ...y arrojó a su hija en un tanque con ácido.

translation.en: Yeah.
That's what we're dealing with.
translation.es: Eso es a lo que nos enfrentamos.

translation.en: You can't do this.
You can't.
I'm sure as shit not the person you're gonna hide it all behind.
translation.es: No pienso ser quien cubra todo esto.

translation.en: You need to just take a breath. I'm gonna fuckin' talk.
translation.es: -Tienes que relajarte y respirar. -Voy a hablar.

translation.en: - No, you're not. - Yeah.
I'm gonna tell everyone what you did.
translation.es: Les diré a todos lo que hiciste.

translation.en: That would be a major mistake.
Is that the target up ahead? Confirm.
(Man on radio) Roger that. Black Mercedes, 60 metres ahead.
translation.es: Afirmativo. Un Mercedes negro, seis metros adelante.

translation.en: (Manuel) This motherfucker...
(In English) What happens when we get to the house?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasará cuando lleguemos a la casa?

translation.en: You'll stop the car, I'll get out.
What will happen to me?
Slow down.
(Man on radio) Six remain.
We're going blind.
(In English) Every night you have families killed.
translation.es: Cada noche asesinas a familias completas.

translation.en: And yet, here you dine.
translation.es: Y aun así, estás aquí cenando.

translation.en: Tonight should be no different.
Do you think the people that sent you here
translation.es: ¿Crees que la gente que te envió aquí...

translation.en: are any different?
Who do you think we learned it from?
The grieving lawyer.
Your wife, you think she'd be proud of what you've become?
translation.es: ¿Crees que tu esposa estaría orgullosa de ver en qué te has convertido?

translation.en: Don't forget about my daughter.
translation.es: No te olvides de mi hija.

translation.en: (In English) Not in front of my boys.
(In English) Go ahead and finish your meal.
(Alejandro) I would recommend not standing on balconies for a while, Kate.
translation.es: Te recomendaría que te alejaras de los balcones por un tiempo, Kate.

translation.en: Sit down.
You look like a little girl when you're scared.
translation.es: Pareces una niña cuando estás asustada.

translation.en: You remind me of the daughter they took away from me.
translation.es: Me recuerdas a la hija que me arrebataron.

translation.en: I need you to sign this piece of paper.
It basically says that everything we did
translation.es: Básicamente dice que todo lo que hicimos...

translation.en: was done by the book.
I can't sign that.
Sign it.
It's OK.
I can't sign that.
God!
You would be committing suicide, Kate.
Come on. Sign it.
You should move to a small town,
translation.es: Deberías mudarte a un pequeño pueblo...

translation.en: where the rule of law still exists.
- You will not survive here. - (Clatters)
You are not a wolf.
And this is the land of wolves now.
translation.es: Y esta es tierra de lobos ahora.
